ygData.subject: My Faction and the Sacrilege Plague
ygData.msgSnippet: A black ship with blood red tinted windows slowly crawls through space.  On board is the ship are enough supplies for a small invasion.  Infact,  that is what

   A black ship with blood red tinted windows slowly crawls through 
space.  On board is the ship are enough supplies for a small 
invasion.  Infact,  that is what this ship is going to do.  In the 
bridge are many Cybertron Bots.  They all happen to have a Predacon 
Symbol on their shoulder.  In the biggest chair, located in the 
middle of the bridge, is occipied by a large green bot.
   
   The bot looks around the bridge.  When the bots eyes looks all the 
way to the left, the bot says, "Kan Kick, are you asleep?"

   A lightly tan bot, whos legs are up on his console and his head is 
leaning to the side quickly sits upright while he rubs his eyes, "No, 
I was wide awake."

   The bot starts to laugh and says, "Don't lie, it's not nice."  THe 
bot then looks behind him and to the right, "Snake eyes, come here."

   The bot he was looking at, who is very thin(For a BW bot), stands 
up and walks towards the bot.  His feet echo against the plating as 
he comes forward, "Yessh Sshir?"

   "Send out a Communication message to all the members of the crew 
to come to the bridge."  The green bot says as he looks at a smudge 
on his right arm rest of his chair, "Ohh and tell Lady Right that 
next time she cleans my chair she needs to make sure there are no 
smudges."

   "Yessh Sshir."  Snake Eyes says as he walks back to his console 
and the ground echo behing him.  When Snake Eyes get back to his 
console he sends out a Communication message to the whole ship that 
can be heard by everybot on the ship, "Hello, thissh issh Sshnake 
Eyessh,  Commander UltraByte hassh asshk me to sshend and 
Communication messhsshage to tell all of you to get you metalic 
tailpipe up in the bridge. Pleasshe."
